# ğŸ“ Student Management Project

A **Python-based desktop application** built using **Tkinter** and **SQLite** to manage student records, courses, and fee transactions through a simple and interactive graphical user interface.

---

## ğŸ“Œ Features

* ğŸ” Admin login system
* ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ“ Student registration with auto-generated ID
* ğŸ” Search student records by registration ID
* ğŸ’° Fee deposit and remaining balance tracking
* ğŸ“š Add and update course details
* ğŸ—„ SQLite database for data storage
* ğŸ–¥ User-friendly GUI using Tkinter

---

## ğŸ›  Technologies Used

* **Language:** Python
* **GUI:** Tkinter
* **Database:** SQLite
* **Image Handling:** Pillow (PIL)

---

## ğŸ—‚ Database Structure

### Student Table

| Field      | Description             |
| ---------- | ----------------------- |
| Std_ID     | Student Registration ID |
| Std_Name   | Student Name            |
| Std_Mob_No | Mobile Number           |
| Std_Course | Course Name             |
| Course_Fee | Total Course Fee        |
| Balance    | Remaining Fee           |

### Course Table

| Field       | Description |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| Course_Name | Course Name |
| Course_Fee  | Course Fee  |

---

## â–¶ How to Run the Project

1. Clone the repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/student-management-project.git
```

2. Navigate to the project directory

```bash
cd student-management-project
```

3. Install required libraries

```bash
pip install pillow
```

4. Run the main file

```bash
python main.py
```
